title: Minecraft 基岩版 Beta 1.15.0.53 发布
author: zyjking
txt_content:
本帖最后由 zyjking 于 2020-2-22 13:18 编辑 

测试版是Minecraft基岩版的测试机制，主要用于下一个正式版的特性预览。
然而，测试版主要用于新特性展示，通常存在大量漏洞。因此对于普通玩家建议仅做测试尝鲜用。使用测试版打开存档前请务必备份。适用于正式版的领域服务器与测试版不兼容。
如果在测试版中遇到旧版存档无法使用的问题，测试版将允许你将存档上传以供开发团队查找问题。
Minecraft基岩版 1.15 仍未发布，1.15.0.53为其第2个测试版。
转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。
https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360040027711

Parity:
版本差异内容同步：
Observer blocks no longer immediately detect a state change when placed放置侦测器时不会立刻改变侦测状态了（红石）

For Map Makers and Add-On Creators:
给地图和附加包制作者：
Item sprites are now data-driven物品的图标现在属于数据驱动了The Drowned mobs are now data-driven溺水怪物现在属于数据驱动了

Fixes:
bug修复：

修复了19个bug
Crashes/Performance崩溃/性能方面
Fixed several crashes that could occur during gameplay修复了游玩时可能发生的崩溃问题Optimised key frame animation playback对关键帧的动画播放进行优化Optimised performance when breaking lots of Kelp plants对破坏大堆海带时进行性能优化

Accessibility辅助功能
The text-to-speech reader now reads URLs properly文字转语音功能现在可以正确识别URL了

General常规
Lingering and Splash Potion particles now stay within their boundaries when in a confined space在密闭的范围中（即四周都有方块阻挡）滞留药水和喷溅药水粒子效果会保留在里面了Fixed a bug that prevented repeating and chain Command Blocks from being opened (MCPE-63252)修复了一个会阻止打开重复和连锁型命令方块的问题Cakes now have the correct texture states when partially eaten (MCPE-14757)修复了啃掉一半的蛋糕材质不正确的问题

Gameplay游玩
Fixed an issue that would cause a 'phantom' water block to appear when placing water on a fire near a sponge block (MCPE-57063)修复了放置水到海绵旁边的火上时会凭空出现水源方块的问题Fixed an issue where water from bubble columns could not be collected (MCPE-37571)修复了当水产生气泡柱时无法收集水的问题Stacked mine carts that occupy the same space will now load and unload as expected (MCPE-54244)叠在一起的矿车现在会弹开了Walking on scaffolding now makes correct sounds (MCPE-53279)修复了走在脚手架上的音效不正确的问题

Mobs怪物
Mobs now consistently take damage when spawning on magma blocks (MCPE-47518)在岩浆块上生成的怪物会受到伤害了

Graphical图形界面
Fixed an issue that would cause armour to unexpectedly render on mobs when being held in its hand修复了当手持盔甲时会意外套到怪物身上的问题

Add-Ons附加包
Custom entities that use the runtime identifier field now use the custom entity's name rather than the vanilla entity's name (MCPE-56229)使用命令杀死怪物时，使用runtime_identifier字段的自定义实体将会显示自定义的实体名称，而不是原版中的实体名称Dispensed splash and lingering potions now have potion effects in their projectile component已经分发的喷溅和滞留药水在弹射物发射时会带有药水效果了Fixed collision box not updating from script修复了冲突框没有从脚本中更新的问题The "damage_sensor" component will now work on non-Mob actors (such as Ender Crystals)damage_sensor组件现在可以使用在非生物上（比如末影水晶）A mob spawned in the air will no longer think it's on the ground once its movement is ticked选中动作时，生成在空中的生物不会认为它在地面上

Character Creator角色创建器
Fixed an issue that meant some character creator selections would not be saved between sessions (MCPE-32089)修复了某些更改选择不会在多个会话之间保存的问题
